title: Medal
marks:
Signature; Inscriptions

obverse of the frame: [ Obverse: [Herman Hameranus] S.P.E.S. Praem II . So
description: struck silver medal in silver frame; obverse, male bust facing the left of Pope Clement XI with the surrounding inscription: [Clemens XI Pont. * Max]; reverse, depicts St. Luke painting the portrait of the Virgin with the Infant Jesus in the heavens; the reclining bull is behind the canvas and easel
creditline: Gift of funds from Mr. and Mrs. Thomas L. Daniels
